findings.title: Agent config regex incomplete for .github/ nested paths
findings.issue: AGENT_CONFIG_RE regex does not match .github/copilot/ and .github/agents/ paths unlike the TS version
findings.suggestion: Add explicit .github/copilot/ and .github/agents/ patterns to the regex or use same prefix-matching approach as TS version. Practical impact very low since vendor orgs (anthropics, openai, google) don't have such paths.
findings.impact: Theoretical: SKILL.md files in .github/copilot/ would not be filtered. Practical: vendor orgs don't have such paths

findings.title: Platform-side tests not found
findings.issue: No test files found for platform-side vendor-org-discovery.ts or admin route handler
findings.suggestion: Tests may be covered by integration tests or deferred for follow-up. Crawl-worker (primary execution path) has 4 tests.
findings.impact: Platform admin endpoint lacks direct test coverage

findings.title: Default branch assumption
findings.issue: Defaults to 'main' branch without validating if it exists
findings.suggestion: Use repo.default_branch from GitHub API response instead
findings.impact: Repos using master or other default branches may have tree scan fail
